I thought Beast Wars was Japanese. Wait the guys who made this site 
copied the name? And my cousin's boyfriend said he saw a Beast Wars 
where Silverbolt was in command was it one of them? And for that 
matter who made Beast Machines (by the way I didn't always think it 
was Japanese I just remembered the poll said what's your favorite 
JAPANESE Transformer cartoon). And for that matter who made RID, and 
Go Bot (I saw just one episode of that)! And are there any plans to 
release these cartoons in the US?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Beast Wars 2 and Beast Wars Neo are show in the Japenese 
cartoon
> cannon. They made them after they saw our Beast Wars.
